title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description:
Bug 9654: Modify Parameters dialog has the following issues:
i. Duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page
ii. The first and second columns could be merged

OB: 

a. The buttons are too small
b. When the dialog is opened, no table entry is selected, but both move buttons are enabled
c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off
d. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters

EB: 

a. The marking between the button and the list is too large
b. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top
c. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic
d. Multiple selections should be allowed as move up/down can be applied to more than one item
e. The signature preview must be a label that wraps
g. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover

SR: 
Enter the Modify Parameters dialog and observe the following:

1. Verify that the buttons are resized to be larger
2. Verify that when the dialog is opened, a table entry is selected
3. Verify that both move buttons are disabled when no table entry is selected
4. Verify that the preview displays the full parameter name when it is very long
5. Verify that the dialog is resized appropriately for methods with many parameters
6. Verify that the marking between the button and the list is reduced to be consistent with other elements
7. Verify that the top button is aligned with the dialog top
8. Verify that the table includes a label to support mnemonic
9. Verify that it is possible to select multiple entries in the table
10. Verify that the move up/down options can be applied to multiple items
11. Verify that the signature preview is displayed as a label and wraps the text
12. Verify that the background color of the signature preview matches the color of a hover
